mapper.insert: insert into wuwei_sky_take_out.dish(name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select d.id, d.name, d.category_id, d.price, d.image, d.description, d.status, d.update_time, f.id as flavorId, f.dish_id, f.name as flavorName, f.value from wuwei_sky_take_out.dish d left join wuwei_sky_take_out.dish_flavor f on d.id = f.dish_id where d.id = #{id}
